name: anomhome-overmind
description: AnomHome Overmind: A self-hosted home dashboard for Linux

scripts.setup-local: echo 'Setting up local AI...' && cp .env.example .env && echo 'Edit .env file and run: npm run validate'
scripts.build-pages: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const docsData=path.join('docs','data');if(!fs.existsSync(docsData))fs.mkdirSync(docsData,{recursive:true});['plates.json','plates.txt'].forEach(f=>{const src=path.join('data',f);const dest=path.join(docsData,f);if(fs.existsSync(src))fs.copyFileSync(src,dest);});console.log('Data files copied to docs/data');"

author: AnomFIN
